title: Caffi Caban Cafe
typeOfFood: International, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Caban Cyf is a social enterprise established to bring rural economic development. Its cafe offers several vegetarian choices and sometimes one vegan one -- made from some organic ingredients and local produce. Relaxed and friendly atmosphere. Features 'Food of the World' buffet on Saturday evenings. In May 2010, Caban extended its catering operation by opening its second caf√© at Pen y Pass at the top of the Llanberis Pass.
